summary: MY DOOR LATCH ON THE DRIVER SIDE DOOR STOPPED LATCHING TO CLOSE THE DOOR WHEN LETTING THE WINDOW DOWN NOW DOOR STAYS OPEN WHEN DRIVING.ITS NOT LATCHED THE LOCK ISN'T CATCHING AND DOOR HANDLE TO OPEN THE DOOR IS LOOSE. I WAS TRYI G TO CLOSE THE DOOR AND THE HANDLE IS NOT LATCHING WHEN I WAS COMING HOME FROM THE GROCERY STORE WITH MR CHILDREN THEY HAVE A RECALL FOR THE BACK DOORS ON THIS TYPE OF CAR BUT THIS IS THE FRONT DOOR DOING THE SAME THING AS THE BACK DOOR IN THE RECALL IT'S JUST THE FRONT DRIVER SIDE DOOR.
